TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationUser extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationUser Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 對使用表單型驗證的 Web 應用程式，設定使用者的認證。

span.span: Configures the user's credentials for Web applications that use forms-based authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可用來以程式設計方式存取和修改組態檔的區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the section of a configuration file. 此類型是包含群組的一部分，則，和型別。This type is part of a group that includes the , the , and the types. 集合型別以外的類型會直接影響基礎的組態標記。The types other than the collection type directly affect the underlying configuration tags. > [!NOTE] > 可將資訊寫入到位於機器、 網站或應用程式層級的組態檔的相關區段。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file at machine, site, or application level only. 在不同的層級，階層中的組態檔中寫入的任何嘗試會導致由剖析器產生的錯誤訊息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a different level in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 不過，您可以使用這個類別來讀取設定資訊在階層中任何層級。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 如需安全性和延展性，建議您使用外部存放庫，例如資料庫、 維持使用者的認證。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範濆爧髍孮若要存取現有的 Web 應用程式的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the to access the objects of an existing Web application. 組態檔會包含類似下列的安裝程式。The configuration file will contain a setup similar to the following. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用[驗證 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 表單的 credentials 項目](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5a001f8-fdbe-4c88-80ca-bfe36df23479)區段中，一定要遵照所說明的指導方針[ASP.NET 驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1(v=vs.100))。If you use the [credentials Element for forms for authentication (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5a001f8-fdbe-4c88-80ca-bfe36df23479) section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1(v=vs.100)). 如需延展性和更佳的安全性，建議您使用外部資料庫來儲存使用者的認證。For scalability and better security, it is recommended you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 如需有關如何建置安全的 ASP.NET 應用程式的詳細資訊，請搜尋 Microsoft MSDN 網站 (msdn.microsoft.com)"保護 ASP.NET 應用程式 」 和 「 建置安全的 ASP.NET 應用程式：驗證、 授權和安全通訊。 」For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications, search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application" and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication." ``` defaultUrl="formsdefault.aspx" protection="Encryption" timeout="5" path="aspnet" slidingExpiration="false" cookieless="UseCookies" domain="domainName"> ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationUser/CS/formsauthenticationuser.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationUser/VB/formsauthenticationuser.vb#1)]
